title: Asaâ€™s Final Years and Mistake
summary: In his later years, King Asa makes a treaty with a foreign king instead of trusting God during a conflict. A prophet rebukes him, but Asa becomes angry and oppresses others. He later becomes diseased but refuses to seek the Lord for healing.

faq.question: What mistake did Asa make?
faq.answer: He relied on a human alliance instead of trusting in the Lord.

faq.question: How did Asa respond to correction?
faq.answer: He became angry and hardened his heart instead of repenting.
